name: Unite The Kingdom
description:
Welcome to Unite The Kingdom!

Play the role of a clan master in RTS where you control everything from his point of view.

Controlls (keyboard/xbox controller in versus mode):

  • movement - arrows/left stick
  • interact/accept - space/A
  • build - q/X
  • capture units - w/Y
  • call army - e/B
  • next building - tab/RB

Build the kingdom, lead your clan and destroy enemies!

The game was created for Lost Relic Games - GAME JAM

Assets Credits:

  • Alex's Assets - tileset
  • lyaseek - units
  • Shade - buildings
  • Matthew Pablo - music
